Listening

Audiobooks really got me interested in 'reading' several years ago. The truth is, the increase in good podcast content has slowed my audiobook consumption.

2019

  • Can't Hurt Me by David Goggins · 08/15
  • Skunk Works: A Personal Memoir of my Years at Lockeed by Ben R. Rich · 08/15
  • Commander in Cheat by Rick Reilly · 05/03 ★
  • The Mastermind by Evan Ratliff · 03/10
  • The System: The Glory and Scandal of Big-Time College Football by Jeff Benedict and Armen Keteyian · 02/22

2018

  • Creative Selection by Ken Kocienda · 08/15
  • The Fifth Risk by Michael Lewis · 11/20
  • Astrophysics for People in a Hurry by Neil deGrasse Tyson · 09/29
  • Fear: Trump in the White House by Bob Woodward · 09/28
  • Liar's Poker by Michael Lewis · 08/21
  • Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow by Yuval Noah Harari · 05/03 ★
  • Born a Crime by Trevor Noah · 2018- ★

2017

  • The Devil in the White City: Murder, Magic, and Madness at the Fair That Changed America by Erik Larson · 12/15
  • American Assassin: A Thriller by Vince Flynn · 11/13
  • American Kingpin: The Epic Hunt for the Criminal Mastermind Behind the Silk Road by Nick Bilton · 08/03
  • Red Notice: A True Story of High Finance, Murder, and One Man’s Fight for Justice by Bill Browder · 07/20
  • Unbroken: A World War II Story of Survival, Resilience, and Redemption by Joe Giorello · 05/18
  • The Dictator's Handbook: Why Bad Behavior is Almost Always Good Politics by John Heller · 03/07 ★

2016

  • Coach: Lessons on the Game of Life by Michael Lewis · 11/23
  • In The Plex: How Google Thinks, Works, and Shapes Our Lives by Steven Levy · 11/15
  • Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari · 11/07 ★
  • 11/22/63: A Novel by Stephen King · 08/29
  • Creativity, Inc: Overcoming the Unseen Forces That Stand in the Way of True Inspiration by Ed Catmull · 08/24
  • So You've Been Publicly Shamed by Jon Ronson · 08/15
  • Extreme Ownership: How US Navy SEALs Lead and Win by Jocko Willink · 07/01 ★
  • Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future by Ashlee Vance · 12/31 ★

2015

  • Born Standing Up: A Comic’s Life by Steve Martin · 12/07
  • A Short History of Nearly Everything by Bill Bryson · 11/20
  • On Writing by Stephen King · 11/13 ★
  • The Martian: A Novel by Andy Weir · 08/01

2000-2015

  • What the Dog Saw: And Other Adventures by Malcolm Gladwell
  • Warrior Soul: The Memoir of a Navy Seal by Chuck Pfarrer
  • The Warrior Elite: The Forging of SEAL Class 228 by Dick Couch ★
  • The Tipping Point: How Little Things Can Make a Big Difference by Malcolm Gladwell
  • The Second Coming of Steve Jobs by Alan Deutschman
  • The Red Circle: My Life in the Navy SEAL Sniper Corps and How I Trained America's Deadliest Marksmen by Brandon Webb
  • The Contortionist's Handbook by Craig Clevenger
  • The Big Miss: My Years Coaching Tiger Woods by Hank Haney
  • The Accidental Billionaires: The Founding of Facebook: A Tale of Sex, Money, Genius and Betrayal A Tale of Sex, Money, Genius and Betrayal by Ben Mezrich
  • SEAL Team Six: Memoirs of an Elite Navy SEAL Sniper by Howard E. Wasdin
  • Outliers: The Story of Success by Malcolm Gladwell
  • Lone Survivor: The Eyewitness Account of Operation Redwing and the Lost Heroes of SEAL Team 10 by Marcus Luttrell
  • Killing Yourself to Live: 85% of a True Story by Chuck Klosterman
  • Into Thin Air: A Personal Account of the Mt Everest Disaster by Jon Krakauer
  • Damn Few: Making the Modern SEAL Warrior by Rorke Denver
  • IV: A Decade of Curious People and Dangerous Ideas by Chuck Klosterman
  • Blink: The Power of Thinking Without Thinking by Malcolm Gladwell
  • A Captain's Duty: Somali Pirates, Navy SEALS, and Dangerous Days at Seal by Richard Phillips
